input.sentences: first we found license plates hanging on the walls .
then there was a stage for live music at the bar .
everyone enjoyed drinks at the bar .
after that everyone stopped to have their picture taken .
finally | there was live music for everyone to enjoy .
output.sentences: The bar's ambiance is low key and not trendy, with walls showing license plates.
There's a small stage for live music.
We decided to stay and we enjoyed drinks at the bar.
Gail stopped and took a picture near the wall, after our waitress said that some famous acts had gotten their start there and left signed posters as tribute.
We were on our third round of drinks when the live music finally got started.
